body.name: adidas Men's Performance Long Boxer Brief Underwear (3-Pack)
features: All-day comfort with a performance edge.
Soft, stretchy, quick-drying material in an athletic comfort fit.
Plush-soft tagless waistband and super smooth stitching deliver superior comfort.
body.description: The ultimate in everyday comfort with a performance edge, adidas performance 3-pack underwear features our proven soft, stretchy moisture-wicking quick dry fabric, an easy fit through the pouch, functional no-gap fly, soft stitching, tagless waistband and no-ride-up construction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptionally Comfortable and Great Value Boxer Briefs!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the adidas Men's Performance Long Boxer Brief Underwear in a 3-pack, and I am thoroughly impressed with their quality, comfort, and value. These boxer briefs have exceeded my expectations in every way, and here's why I highly recommend them:1. Superior Comfort: The comfort level of these boxer briefs is outstanding. The fabric is soft, lightweight, and breathable, making them a joy to wear throughout the day. The snug yet stretchy fit ensures optimal support without feeling constricting. Whether you're engaging in physical activities or going about your daily routine, these boxer briefs offer exceptional comfort.2. Excellent Performance: The adidas Performance Long Boxer Briefs are designed with performance in mind. The moisture-wicking fabric effectively keeps you dry by wicking away sweat, making them ideal for workouts or active lifestyles. The material also promotes breathability, preventing any discomfort or irritation caused by excessive perspiration.3. Durable and High-Quality: The quality of these boxer briefs is top-notch. The stitching is well-done, ensuring long-lasting durability even after multiple washes. The fabric retains its shape and color, maintaining a fresh and new look for an extended period. You can count on these boxer briefs to withstand the test of time.4. Versatile Design: The sleek and understated design of these boxer briefs makes them versatile for various occasions. Whether you're wearing them for sports activities, daily wear, or even as a base layer, they provide a comfortable and seamless fit. The absence of excessive branding or logos adds to their versatility and simplicity.5. Great Value: The 3-pack option offers excellent value for your money. You get three pairs of high-quality boxer briefs at an affordable price, making them a cost-effective investment. The combination of quality, comfort, and affordability is a win-win situation for any buyer.In conclusion, the adidas Men's Performance Long Boxer Brief Underwear in a 3-pack is a fantastic choice for those seeking ultimate comfort, performance, and value. From their exceptional comfort and moisture-wicking capabilities to their durable construction, these boxer briefs have proven to be a reliable and worthwhile purchase. Whether you're an athlete, a fitness enthusiast, or simply someone looking for everyday comfort, these boxer briefs will exceed your expectations.Note: To ensure the perfect fit, it's advisable to consult the sizing chart provided by adidas. Remember to follow the care instructions for optimal longevity and performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and stays put
reviews.reviewText: I like how soft the material is and how it hugs onto you and stays put all day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Wow, the comfort of the underwear briefs are amazing to my husband. He love the length, the quality of the material ,the firm fitting that holds everything in place and Adidas is his favorite brand overall, so he matches from the head to the toes “Team Adidas” thanks Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These fit and feel great! But...
reviews.reviewText: The only issue I have with these is they tend to ride up the backside a bit too far for my comfort if you know what I mean. These seem to fit a little smaller than previous ones I have bought in the past. But the material and overall quality of this product are still great and have a much better price tag than other leading brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight and comfortable. Will 100% buoy again. I wear a 34 waist and bought large. Wears perfect for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like these for working out in. The leg length is perfect and tight enough not to run up. But not so tight I’m uncomfortable. The elastic band holds nicely and they hold everything in place and avoid too much rub or drama between thighs. Great workout underwear and I use them frequently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are neither, as long as they are shown, nor are they extra-large, they are too damn small. I don't know if they were mislabeled, or if the sizing is just not consistent with everything else I've ever purchased that is extra large. I bought another brand in the same size, at Walmart, that was cheaper, and another brand from Amazon, same size, and both of those fit perfectly. I gave these to my son, who is several inches shorter than me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These underwear are extremely comfortable. They are great for workouts. The material helps to allow maximum flexibility and dryness.

reviews.reviewTitle: Son excelentes, pero...ojo...deben pedir la talla siguiente pues vienen un poco reducidos.
reviews.reviewText: No alcanzó las 5 estrellas pues vienen un poco reducidos, por ello deben pedir la talla siguiente pues , para no fallar. Algo bueno en mi caso es que venían 3 piezas en negro y por ahí la descripción decía que venían un par de grises.
Sencillamente EXTRAORDINARIOS! @did@s NO FALLA, no genera sudoración, comodidad 100% garantizada. Gracias Amazon

reviews.reviewTitle: Not as long as s shown
reviews.reviewText: Not as long as shown in pic
Son de material muy delgado, me gustaría que fueran de algodón misma longitud
